mapper.select: select a.*,b.cook_num,b.cook_db,b.cook_db from recipe a INNER JOIN cook_image b on a.recipe_num = b.recipe_num ORDER BY recipe_best desc

select a.*,b.material_name from (select c.recipe_num,c.recipe_title,c.recipe_content,c.recipe_time,c.recipe_best,d.cook_db from recipe c INNER JOIN cook_image d on c.recipe_num = d.recipe_num) a inner join material b on a.recipe_num = b.recipe_num where a.recipe_time <= ${time} and b.material_name = '${material}'
